text: Aleksander Ścibor-Rylski (16 March 1928 - 3 April 1983) was a Polish screenwriter and film director. He wrote for more than 25 films between 1951 and 1981. he was born in aristocratic family of Clan Ostoja.Minakowski ==Selected filmography== * Rok pierwszy (1960) * The Impossible Goodbye (1962) * Black Wings (1963) * The Ashes (1965) * Man of Marble (1976) * Dagny (1977) * Man of Iron (1981) ==See also== * Zbigniew Ścibor-Rylski * Clan Ostoja * Ostoja coat of arms ==References== ==External links== * Category:1928 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Polish screenwriters Category:Polish film directors Category:People from Grudziądz Category:20th-century screenwriters
title: Aleksander Ścibor-Rylski
